data.htmlContent: Olive Gardenâ€™s lunch menu is where classic Italian flavors meet comfort at a price that wonâ€™t break the bank. The famous Soup, Salad & Breadsticks combo keeps people coming back, and for good reasonâ€”unlimited fresh salad, warm breadsticks, and a bowl of hearty soup. Light, filling, and packed with flavor.

LUNCH-SIZED FAVORITES.description: Enjoy your favorite Olive Garden classics in perfectly portioned lunch sizes, available weekdays until 3 p.m.

items.name: Chicken Parmigiana
items.review: The perfect lunch-sized portion of a classic! Crispy chicken, melted cheese, and rich marinara, all over a bed of spaghetti. It's a midday power-up that won't send you into a food coma. ðŸ’ª

items.question: When are Olive Gardenâ€™s lunch hours?
items.answer: Lunch is typically served Monday through Friday until 3:00 PM. On weekends and holidays, only the dinner menu is available all day.

items.question: Does Olive Garden offer lunch specials?
items.answer: Yes, Olive Garden provides lunch-sized favorites, including options like Spaghetti with Marinara or Meat Sauce, Fettuccine Alfredo, and Eggplant Parmigiana, each accompanied by unlimited soup or salad and breadsticks.

items.question: Are lunch portions available on weekends?
items.answer: Lunch-sized portions are generally offered Monday through Friday before 3:00 PM. On weekends, only dinner portions are available.
